name: Toad Stone
description:
There is a village surrounded by bog and fen which is shrouded in fog from October to January.  For months at a time it is completely cut off from the rest of the world.  One day a Traveller arrives, hooded and wearing a ring with a strange mud coloured stone lodged in it.  After a night staying at the local inn the fog arrives early.

Is the Traveller trapped in here with the Villagers?  Are the Villagers prey for the Traveller? Or is it the Fog?

A GMless game to find out what happens when the Fog comes.
